import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import logo from "../Images/Logo.png"; function Header() { return ( {/* Logo + Brand */} Nature's Cure {/* Home & About (next to brand) */}
Home About
{/* Login on right */}

); } export default Header;
